parameters: The whole place is being corrupted by
darkness. There's a demon over there.
I got him... it was close.
It wouldn't be safe to go alone in there.
Even more in my current condition.
I'll go back to the garrison.
Olaf, Eir and Siegfried have one last task.
After that, a Darklord destroyed the castle.
I made this boss so strong, I don't understand.
Well GG. But it's not the end I wanted, so, please
Corruption is growing from this hole.
I would like to take some samples...

Whe should hurry to the garrison and rest.

It's like something is trying to get me...
I'm stuck in this keep since the last
War of Gods. Did you know that Leoric was
the captain of this garrison for a time ?
I used the last bits of my power to
partially take control of his mind. I made
him great, I made him king.
But I needed power to revive my body.
I created a Dark Portal, to summon monsters
and force you to generate \C[30]Dark Power\C[0].
I absorbed this huge amount of \C[30]Dark Power\C[0]
you generated to expand my corruption and
It was because of me that the
\n<Liara>I'm sorry. But I'll have to kill you now.
\C[6]Eir\C[0], I won't hold back my \C[30]Dark Powers\C[0].
I'll do my best to support you. \n<Eir>
generated to expand my corruption and
revive my body. But you didn't generate
enough so I'm not so strong...\n<Darklord>
I thought you would use your Dark Powers,
but you achieved to beat all the monsters
Because of that I'm very weak.
It was en error in the first place to get
these powers. I can manage without them.
All the corruption disappeared from the keep and the
Liara died after using too much Dark Powers.
But we'll all remember her \fbDark Valiance\fb.
All the corruption disappeared from the keep and the
And Liara was already in route for another adventure.
But we'll all remember her \fbDark Valiance\fb.
All the corruption disappeared from the keep and the
castle. The world was saved. Liara renounced to her
Dark Powers and became a Paladin.
But we'll all remember her \fbDark Valiance\fb.
A game created by Darenn Keller.
Thank you very much for playing the game.
It was made in 3 days during the RPG Maker Jam #3.
The game isn't complete ! So follow me at @DarennKeller
to miss nothing about the future updates.
If you want to share anything with me, don't hesitate
to contact me or leave a comment on the itch page  !
Thanks to RPG Maker Alliance for organizing this jam.
Special thanks to Korin for the main menu visual !
